voice.name: en-US-NancyNeural
voice.prosody: You're saying this only to make me go.

voice.name: en-US-TonyNeural
voice.prosody: I'm saying it because it's true. Inside of us we both know you belong with Victor. You're part of his work, the thing that keeps him going. If that plane leaves the ground and you're not with him, you'll regret it.

voice.name: en-US-TonyNeural
voice.prosody: Maybe not today, maybe not tomorrow, but soon, and for the rest of your life.
